text: 5.45: Jop 25.3; Ef 5.1Nde maaŋ muunga, nde Ndia mbu Hevenan ki, nde ana tari kɨrga. Nden Ndia mbu Hevenan ki, ana ra mbuim, ana tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgi ga shɨgi, ana vhɨra tɨvir vhuuiŋ ga mbui gumgi ga shɨgi. Ana vhɨra mboga mbuim, ana tɨvir vhuuiŋ ga mbui gumgir nzi, ana vhɨra tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui gumgir nzi.
